channel.title: My first autologger--->uses latest srl<---

item.title: My first autologger--->uses latest srl<---
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

Hiya, congratulations on your first script! reminds me of my first script hehe. Some things to note -

you have specified that you are using the SRL include, good choice. As Greg said do some reserach into SRL, it has a fantastic mouse function which is pretty undetectable. Secondly now that you have learnt the basics of mouse movement id suggest finding a tutorial or colour finding or bitmaps. Instead of waiting a set ammount of time… say for example you lagg and miss a timer it will then just be clicking randomly use a bitmap or color to identify different stages of the login.

Exspand this script, its a great place to start from

Read full topic

item.description:
@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

Randomize the waits, use some SRL mouse procedures they are better. This will get you banned super fast.

item.title: My first autologger--->uses latest srl<---
item.dc:creator: @onizak onizak
item.description:
@onizak wrote:

my first rs autologger----> use latest srl/scar 3.15<---- enjoy fools!

program autologin;

{.include srl/srl.scar}

const
username =‘changemeh’; //your username
password =‘changemeh’; //your password

procedure login;
begin
Movemouse(380, 186)
wait(1000)
ClickMouse(380, 186,true)
wait(1000);
Typesend(username)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(377, 340)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(377, 340,true)
wait(1000);
Typesend(password)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(371, 378)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(371, 378,true)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(390, 350)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(390, 350,true)
Writeln(‘now logged in, hoped you enjoyed it!’)
Terminatescript;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
Cleardebug;
writeln(‘Logging in’)
login;
end.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2009, 07:54:10 pm[/size][hr]O and by the way that account is lvl 3 for all those dumb hackers hehe :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2009, 07:56:48 pm[/size][hr]sorry to double post but that was due to my failure to remove an acc/user of my level 3 person lol…give some feedback…:o

Read full topic
